.. _`picard SomToFastq`:

PICARD SOMTOFASTQ
=================

Converts a SAM or BAM file to FASTQ.






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule bam_to_fastq:
        input:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam"
        output:
            fastq1="reads/{sample}.R1.fastq",
            fastq2="reads/{sample}.R2.fastq"
        log:
            "logs/picard/sam_to_fastq/{sample}.log"
        params:
            extra="" # optional: Extra arguments for picard.
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/picard/samtofastq"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
